title: Cd-Ag standard cell - voltage after 5 minutes

content.question:
The spontaneous reaction that occurs when the cell above operates is 2 Ag+ + Cd(s) â†’ 2 Ag(s) + Cd2+

Which of the above occurs for the following circumstance?

Current is allowed to flow for 5 minutes

choices.label: Voltage decreases but remains above zero
Voltage becomes zero and remains at zero

content.answer: Voltage decreases but remains above zero

skill.text: 2.F: Explain how modifications to an experimental procedure will alter results.
